data.Zdeněk Pokorný:
Zdeněk Pokorný is a 35-year-old Czech scientific researcher who enjoys helping old ladies across the road, theatre and learning new languages. He is intelligent and caring, but can also be very pessimistic and a bit moody.

Physically, Zdeněk is in good shape. He is very tall with light skin, red blond hair and blue eyes.

He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. He was raised by his mother, his father having left when he was young.

He is currently single. His most recent romance was with a pick pocket called Petra Dohnalová, who was the same age as him. They broke up because Zdeněk got fed up of being taken advantage of.

Zdeněk's best friend is a scientific researcher called Hanuš Rezler. They have a very firey friendship. He also hangs around with Viktoriya Polednová and Vladimír Kopecký. They enjoy drinking beer together.

personality.Hobbies: helping old ladies across the road, theatre, learning new languages, bowling, watching sport, reading, drinking

background.Early years: Zdeněk grew up in an impoverished neighbourhood. He was raised by his mother, his father having left when he was young.
background.Formative years: Zdeněk got his first job as a lab assistant at age 18. Zdeněk went to univeristy and got a degree
background.Most traumatic childhood experience: His father leaving when he was two

hanuš_rezler.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

viktoriya_polednová.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

vladimír_kopecký.Relationship: They get on well most of the time

stanislav_kunz.Relationship: Zdenek and Stanislav spent a lot of time together before their father walked out on Zdenek's mum but do not see each other as siblings.

marcela_pokorny.Relationship: They get on well most of the time.

marie_bílková.Reason for breakup: Marie wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr'

petra_dohnalová.Reason for breakup: Zdenek got fed up of being taken advantage of

timeline.2002: Starts work at Charles University as a lab assistant
timeline.2005: Relationship with Helena Knollová ends (Helena wanted somebody more 'badass')
timeline.2007: Resigns from job as a lab assistant at Charles University. Starts work at Research Me at junior scientific researcher
timeline.2010: Gets together with Marie Bílková. Resigns from job as junior scientific researcher at Research Me. Starts work at Prof's Research Hospital as a scientific researcher
timeline.2011: Relationship with Marie Bílková ends (Marie wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr')
timeline.2016: Relationship with Petra Dohnalová ends (Zdeněk got fed up of being taken advantage of)
